title: Van der Poel Chooses Dirt Over Tarmac: Road Worlds Out, MTB Worlds In
content:
Classics king Van der Poel will return to the Tour de France, but will skip the road worlds in Rwanda to chase the mountain bike rainbow jersey in 2025.

Read the full article at Van der Poel Chooses Dirt Over Tarmac: Road Worlds Out, MTB Worlds In on Velo.
author: ahood
